name: PUSH PUSH PUSH
description:
A game made in 3 hours for a group job interview at a Tea Shop

run into each other until one of you falls of the platform! you can also jump.

Restart by hit Y on the gamepad or R on the keyboard

Design/Programming by @gaysovans

Music by @Sintecta

Controls

Keyboard:

P2: Arrow Keys - move

UP Key - Jump

P1: WASD - move

W - jump

GamePad Supported
